page.title: 18THE EDUCATION SYSTEM
page.content: There is a total of sixteen schools in our area. These are Heathlands In_ fants and Juniors, Elmrise Infants a_ nd Juniors, Kingsleigh Infants, Juni_ ors and Secondary, Hill View Infants and Juniors, Glenmoor (for girls), Slades Farm Special School, Talbot Combined Middle, St.Mark's Juniors and Infants and the Langside Special School. There is a wide variety of schools in our area; there are nurseries, infants, juniors, an Institute of Higher Education, a spastics school, a day special school (mixed), bilater_ al and co_educational secondaries.So, you can be educated from four to adult. This is a wide variety because there are so many people to be edu_ cated and because schools were set up at different times according to different educational theories.
